remarks: Function-builder for derivative, product rule.  A version of ~ dvmptmul using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
dvmptmulf.ph $e |- F/ x ph $.
dvmptmulf.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptmulf.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. CC ) $.
dvmptmulf.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. V ) $.
dvmptmulf.ab $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptmulf.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> C e. CC ) $.
dvmptmulf.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> D e. W ) $.
dvmptmulf.cd $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> C ) ) = ( x e. X |-> D ) ) $.
dvmptmulf $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> ( A x. C ) ) ) = ( x e. X |-> ( ( B x. C ) + ( D x. A ) ) ) ) $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
$d X x $.
